$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE support

quiet_mode.description: Suppress most toast notifications (rate limit, account switching, etc.). Recovery toasts are always shown.

debug.description: Enable debug logging to file. Env override: OPENCODE_ANTIGRAVITY_DEBUG=1

log_dir.description: Custom directory for debug logs. Env override: OPENCODE_ANTIGRAVITY_LOG_DIR=/path/to/logs

keep_thinking.description: Preserve thinking blocks for Claude models using signature caching. Env override: OPENCODE_ANTIGRAVITY_KEEP_THINKING=1

session_recovery.description: Enable automatic session recovery from tool_result_missing and thinking errors.

auto_resume.description: Automatically send 'continue' prompt after successful recovery. Only applies when session_recovery is enabled.

resume_text.description: Custom text to send when auto-resuming after recovery.

signature_cache.description: Signature cache configuration for persisting thinking block signatures. Only used when keep_thinking is enabled.
